item.title: Death Stranding 2 PS5 DualSense Controller Is Up for Preorder
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/where-to-buy-death-stranding-2-ps5-dualsense-controller

A new limited-edition controller is now available. The DualSense Wireless Controller – Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Limited Edition (that's a mouthful) is live exclusively on PlayStation Direct. You can preorder it now for $84.99 / £74.99, roughly a month ahead of the release of the game itself.

DualSense Wireless Controller – Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Limited Edition

DualSense Wireless Controller – Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Limited Edition

  • See in the UK for £74.99

Speaking of, you can also preorder Death Stranding 2, which is set to release exclusively for PS5 on June 26. If you're curious about the game, you can check out our Death Stranding 2 hands-on preview, which is based on (no joke) 30 hours of gameplay.

The controller itself is a limited-edition affair, meaning when it's gone, it's gone. Unlike some previous special PS5 controllers, it's not going to be available at other retailers, so PlayStation Direct is your only option.

DualSense Wireless Controller – Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Limited Edition

If you want to add this controller to your collection, I'd buy it sooner than later. Limited-edition PS5 controllers can sell out pretty fast, and this one's not coming back once it's gone.

Chris Reed is a commerce editor and deals expert for IGN. He also runs IGN's board game and LEGO coverage. You can follow him on Bluesky.
